extendedInfo.description: NOW WITH VIDEOS EXPLAINING CERTAIN CONCEPTS! Not only Pass Exam 70-640, but MASTER THE MATERIAL.The absolute best exam simulation / study system available.This is the FREE VERSION of our most popular study software! Allows you complete/full access to 2 entire exam question pools (additional available after upgrade). This is also an Advertisement supported version. Ads will be removed and premium content unlocked after upgrade.Because of our 5-TIER SYSTEM, you are able to decide how much detail you need to efficiently learn the material you need to master.Tier 1: Question / Answer SimulationTier 2: Quick Explanation of the AnswerTier 3: Link to a VERY DETAILED explanationTier 4: Reference Sites so that you can study in depth the concept presentedTier 5: Many of our questions have links to VIDEO tutorials explaining the material in depth.This exam simulation / study system will help you get your Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist (MCTS) certification! This exam is also good towards the MCITP certification as well.This is hands down the best way to get certified! Our authors are actual certification boot-camp istructors that know how to get the job done.Revolutionary study system for:Exam 70-640: TS: Windows Server 2008 Active Directory, ConfiguringThis system is designed to help you study more efficiently. Each question in this program has been created to help you master concepts that are tested via real exams. Created by actual instructors of Microsoft Boot-Camps, these questions have been proven to help people most efficiently pass each exam. Take your knowledge of the subject as far as you would like. You can master the subject matter and pass the exam, or you can dive deeper into the explanations and learn to be a real-world master of the technologies.This includes:- Exam Simulation Mode- Study Mode- Timed Mode- Explanations- Detailed / Graphical Explinations- Study Tips- Comment ability for each question- Mark / Review Questions- Save ResultsWhen you pass Exam 70-640: TS: Windows Server 2008 Active Directory, Configuring, you complete the requirements for the following certification(s):â¢Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist (MCTS): Windows Server 2008 Active Directory, ConfigurationExam 70-640: TS: Windows Server 2008 Active Directory, Configuring: counts as credit toward the following certification(s):â¢Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP): Enterprise Administratorâ¢Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP): Server Administrator

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: This app works fine on the HTC EVO with cyanogenmod installed.    I tend to overprepare for certification exams and I\'m currently using the MS Press book and the examcram book for studying/practice questions and the questions on this app do not seem to have the same level difficulty.  Also, I\'ve noticed a number of grammar issues and things that just seem wrong.  Example of grammar issue: \"you need to explain the concept of lower-level AD objects when they become heir to Group policy settings to a group of new IT trainees.  What is that called?\"  Example of answer that seems wrong: \"you have a network with over 1000 computer nodes configured.  You have a very important software program that must eventually be installed on all user computers.  However, to make sure the service is running properly, you have been instructed to create a test deployment of 10 different machines.  How can you properly configure an update to target on these 10 machines\"  The answer they list as correct is \"create an organizational unit for the 10 specified machines\". Creating an OU will not will not \"properly configure an update to target these 10 machines\", which I believe is wrong or needs rewording.
reviews.author: A Google User
